attributes.title: Not even worth a star
attributes.review: This app hacked into all of my social media accounts and posted “Trump 2020” everywhere, and outed me as a trump supporter to my entire democratic family 😭. I’m currently on a street corner with my goldfish trying to find a place to stay. Would not recommend to closeted trump supporters unless they wanted the same fate!💔

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: Instantly when i downloaded it, my phone jumped out of my hands and hit the ground. I would've thought i had just dropped it but the app was opened and running. I tried to go to the home screen but it wouldn't let me. All the app was saying was: "MAGA MAGAMAGA" i was so scared. For your own safety, please don't download this app.

attributes.title: I can’t get it to work?
attributes.review: I was very excited to download this app, but it is extremely glitchy and not functionable at all. I try to get points so I can have a picture with POTUS 🙏🏻 but my screen just goes black and my phone starts blaring a loud alarm? not sure if anyone else has this issue

attributes.title: this app RUINED my life!!
attributes.review: When i first got the app it gave me 3 viruses and it hacked all of my accounts. It hacked my twitter, instagram, snapchat, and bank account. It also buffers a lot to the point where you can’t even use it anymore and it kept showing me a cheeto puff, wig wearing old man which gave me nightmares for weeks!! DO NOT GET THIS APP!!!

attributes.title: Acab
attributes.review: Do to my absolute hatred of trump and pig cops I’m sorry but I don’t think I could support this app :( .....I wanted to like Bling bling and a Cheetos love child but I simply could not 🎅🏽 sadly I am a lgbt women of color so idk WHAT IT IS but something tells me that me+trump just wouldn’t match 😢 I can’t talk about it anymore because it’s making me cry 😭😢😭😢😭 HES still a daddy tho.

attributes.title: do not let your kids use this app!!
attributes.review: my 10 year old son downloaded this app on my phone and he was up crying all night long! if you value your children’s sanity do not use it. as soon as he opened it he was jump scared by an orange monster, needless to say my poor Billy started bawling his eyes out.

attributes.title: horrible quality
attributes.review: this is just about the worst app i have ever seen, it seems to have become infested with wierd pictures of this man. This app has alot lf technical difficulties and its horrible. do not recommend. if you decided to download, do it at your own risk and remember to bleach your eyes after❤️

attributes.title: no❤️
attributes.review: if i could give this app 0/5 stars i would😙🤩😌i opened up this app to support our beautiful🥰gorgeous president, mr. cheeto🙈 but when i opened up the app i was Tèrïfîęd💀 the orange took up the whole screen and yelled mean things at me😓 i’m too scared to ever open the app again😱would not recommend for anyone under the age of 69🤯🥴no! bad app!

attributes.title: not surprised. just disappointed
attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I wanted to support our wonderful president. The second I opened this app though, all the lights went out and all I heard was a maniacal laugh. When I turned around I saw the Cheeto himself and pence right next to him. Congrats on coming out of the closet tho pence:)

attributes.title: Very sad
attributes.review: I came onto here 🤙🏼😀🥰😇🕐💗being told that they sell baby kidneys😍😍😍. I was wrong. 😔Trump lied to me. I can’t even get the full dead baby body. 💔💔💔😰😰They also told me I can’t have my own dead baby collage. ✨🎱👄👁. I expected to buy dead baby bodies and hopefully some dog nut 😱🤑💀💀💀sack keychains 😏🤬😡and they said they can’t do that anymore. 🧐🥰🥶😓
